content: निर्हृ {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To take or draw out from, extract; <ls>R. 14. 42.</ls> {@--2@} To carry out the dead body; <ls>Ms. 5. 91</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 15.</ls> {@--3@} To remove (as a fault &c.) {@--4@} To carry or take away. {@--5@} To export (goods). {@--6@} To change or mix together (clothes &c.).
